title: Bloomberg Markets: Taking Pulse of Trump's Heartland Base
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Taking Pulse of Trump's Heartland Base
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Esmé Deprez Projects and Investigations Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing her story "Trump’s Heartland Base Is Ecstatic, Giddy, Perplexed and Patient" on the continued support for President Trump among America's heartland.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
